Can you explain how to use the `getidentitycontent` command with only one parameter, the identity name?

The `getidentitycontent` command actually requires more than one parameter. The correct syntax is `getidentitycontent "name@ || iid" (heightstart) (heightend) (txproofs) (txproofheight) (vdxfkey)`. You need to provide the identity name or IID, as well as other parameters such as the height range, transaction proofs, and VDXF key.
